reviews.review: 一款不错的团队合作游戏.

Lot of people hate on this game, but I for one think it's great. It's hard to be a killer in this day and age with all the liberal panzies runnin amock but trust me, get the Mike Myers Pack, and BOOM. You'll be hanging people out to dry for dayyyyyys.

good game

Ok for the first 5 hours then you slowly realise it's nothing more than a repetive chore with a shit community.

Playing as survivors is basically a generator fixing sim. Does wandering around a map for an entire game fixing generator after generator sound fun? No didn't think so. Why not have different/interesting objectives to complete for every map?  

Playing as a killer is also totally banal. Have fun being frustrated as a survivor jumps in and out of a window over and over again so you can't get them. 

The community is also rotten, be prepared after a match to be called an asshole, noob, faggot, nigger and all kinds of foul nonsense. 

**** 4/10 

I suggest giving this a wide berth

Very fun game, I gifted the game to my friends and now we play it together.

This game consists about a player being the killer, there are different killers and each of them have different abilities, survivors have to fix the required amount of generators and find the escape or secret exit.
Killers must find all the survivors and hang them until they die.

Features:
You get to choose if you want to be killer or survivor, which is an option I really like.

You can customize your characters, buy DLC's to have more things to wear on your characters and in some DLC's you will also get new characters, such as killers or survivors.

Character perks, add-ons and offerings: You get to add items or power ups to your character + offerings that if you win, grants you boosts.

There is an option to make a private game called, ''Kill your friends'', where you have to play as the killer against your friends that play as survivor, you get to choose any perk, add on and offerings for your character and you can also choose the map for your custom/private game.

DLC'S: As I mentioned before, there are DLC's, these DLC's give you either: accesories or killers & survivors.

CAMPERS:
Yes, there are many campers in this game that will stay right next to you until you die so another player doesn't rescue you, however, you can counter it by pulling off a distraction.

BUGS:
From what I've seen so far, there are around 2 bugs that don't affect your gameplay.

This game is worth it, but if you don't believe me, try watching a gameplay like I did before!
10/10, I never get tired of playing it!
不错的游戏，就是逃生者匹配会出现连不上的情况，而且一直持续

2. a lot and i mean a lot of people leave after they get captured so u cant save them which really sucks cause it puts u at such a disadvantage.

Ok where do I begin this game first off is really broken. I mainly play a Survivor all the time and I can tell you this. You can literally always win as the Survivor and I can even prove it in game to. All you have to do is run thats it run jump threw a window then wait for him to go around and jump back threw. And then again and again and again. The Killer it is basically impossible for the killer to win unless you have idiot players. But if you do the trick you win. The killer focuses on you while 3 other people do a stupid ass Generator. Even if you left him to go to another player. Guess what lol that player will just do the same thing. I really wanted to like this game and tbh  I did when it first came out. But this game is Unbalanced unfair for the killer and 100% boring. The reason its boring is simple. As a Survivor you do NOTHING  but hide and turn on a damn Generator like really. Thats all you do. Just turn on a Generator the entire game. You turn 4 on and you basically win.  So not only are you just sitting there doing nothing but screw around with a Generator. But the killer can't stop you from doing it cause all you have to do is just run to a damn window or wait by a barricade for him to be stunned. And if they have the flash lights lol just another LONG ass stun to waste time. That is basically it. For a game where the Survivors should feel afraid of the killer there not if anything its nothing but Survivors Taunting the killer to come to them. Do not buy this game I mean it. You will either like the game for about a hour or 2 then hate it and never touch it again. Or you will just straight out hate it at the beginning. In conclusion this game deserves a 3/10. The game is fun if you play a Survivor at the beginning of the game. But after you play him for about 2 hours you will find yourself very bored and wishing you never bought the game. As for the killer lol. There is nothing fun about being the killer. You don't feel like a badass or a actual killer. You feel like a idiot just walking around looking at Generators.
ТОП ИГРА

살인마 입장에서 본 생존자: 아오 저 바퀴벌레같은 놈들 잡히기만 해봐라 확마

생존자 입장에서 본 살인마: 스킬체크 제발 제발 ㅇㄴ ㄷㄷㄷㄷ

굉장히 긴장감있고 스릴있는게임입니다. 
근데 이 게임 튜토리얼이랍시고 그냥 영문으로 규칙설명이나 투 ㄱ전져놓고 실제는 직접 고통받아보라고 하는 식인 불친절한 게임인데 랭크개념이 있다보니 역시 많이 해본놈이 확실하게 유리하고 살인마가 초보면 생존자 4명이서 살인마를 가지고 노는 장면도 종종 펼쳐집니다. 초반엔 MMR이 조금이나마 있는것인지 초보생존자들의 뚝배기를 트래퍼로 깨고 댕겼지만 랭크가 오름에 따라 MMR이 같이 오르는지 19랭크인 살인마 상대로 11랭크 16랭크 17랭크의 애드온 인벤 빵빵한 생존자들에게 하나둘씩 농락을 당하더니 결국에는 한게임에 생존자 두명이상 엔티티곁으로 보내는것도 버거워졌네여;

하지만 위의 단점을 감안하더라도 데드 바이 데이라이트느 DLC없이도 할만한 재미난 겜입니다(물론 13일의 금요일 제이슨 아조씨처럼 개사기에 잔인한 고유 페이탈리티가 없이 공양플레이는 아쉽)
그래도 생존자를 할때는 생판 모르는 사람들이랑 백날 해보는것보단 적어도 이 겜을 좀 할줄아는 스피드 왜건들과 함께하는것이 좋을것 같습니다. 물론 살인마입장에선 친구와 함께 살아남는 바퀴벌레들을 죽이기 버거워지는...

Regardless, if you enjoy games like DAMNED, this is what all those games wanted to be...

Dead by Daylight – survival horror z asymetrycznym trybem rozgrywki wieloosobowej, wyprodukowany przez Behavior Interactive i wydany przez Starbreeze Studios. Gra została wydana 14 czerwca 2016 roku na systemy Windows.

Rozgrywka Dead by Daylight jest asymetryczna, tj. jeden gracz staje do rozgrywki przeciwko zazwyczaj czterem innym. Ta grupa pięciu graczy to maksymalnie 4 uciekinierów i jeden zabójca. Zadaniem uciekinierów jest wydostanie się z zamkniętej mapy gry, zaś zadaniem zabójcy jest uniemożliwienie tego. Gracze chcący uciec mają za zadanie naprawienie i włączenie odpowiedniej liczby generatorów prądu, pozwalających na otwarcie drzwi i ucieczkę z terenu mapy. Zadaniem zabójcy jest zabicie pozostałych graczy (uciekinierów).

Gracze po obu stronach mają możliwość wybrania postaci, którą chcą kierować w grze. Uciekający mają do dyspozycji 7 postaci, każda mająca inne zdolności do wykorzystania w trakcie rozgrywki. Grający zabójcą również posiada opcje wyboru spośród 6 postaci może to być  (m.in. Michael Myers), z których każda ma inne zdolności i techniki zabijania.

Rozgrywka trwa do momentu ucieczki przez drzwi lub ukryty właz albo gdy wszyscy uciekinierzy zginą. Po zakończonej rozgrywce gracze otrzymują punkty doświadczenia do wydania na dalsze rozwijanie swojej postaci.

Akcja odbywa się na jednej z sześciu losowo wybranych mapach, na której znajdują się różnego typu przeszkody i znajdźki. Zabójca widzi świat z perspektywy pierwszej osoby, natomiast uciekający z perspektywy trzeciej osoby.
非常不错的游戏，就是人少了点，匹配时间有点小长啊啊啊啊啊。

So nach etwa 2 Jahren in denen das Spiel nun raus ist mache ich dann mal mein schlechtes Review noch schlechter ...

Vor 2 Jahren wurde dieses Stück rohes ungeschliefenes Gold released und es ist seit dem nur Berg ab gegangen ...
Angefangen hat es mit einem asymmetrischem Spiel 4 Überlebende gegen 1 Killer in einem Horror Genre ... so denkt man sich mhmmm interessante killer ... gutes system und der killer muss auch stark sein schließlich spielt er ja gegen 4! Tja denkste ... ich fang einfach mal mit den Pros und Cons an ...

Pros:
- viele interessante Killer viele Horror Ikonen
- viele "könnten" Interessante Maps
- viele Personaliesierungsmöglichkeiten dank Perks / Add-Ons und Opfergaben
- viele Möglichkeiten

Cons:
- schlechteste Community der Online-Spiele Geschichte noch schlechter als League of Legends ...
- 80% der maps sind Copy-Paste maps mit nur Setting Änderung
- Geschichte/Gameplay wie aus einem schlechten B-Horrorfilm (Dämonen wollen Opfer und geben dafür Belohnungen)
- kein Horrorfaktor zu finden (Grafik nicht wirklich grusselig ... 3. Person Perspektive nimmt jeden Nervenkitzel ... Herzschlag wenn der Killer auch noch 20-40 m entfernt ist ein zu starker indikator ... die Einzige wirkliche Möglichkeit jemanden zu töten ist es Ihn an einen Harken zu hängen (3 mal oder lange Wartezeit) ansonsten sehr seltenes Item farmen um 1 Kill-Animation per Killer zu bekommen)
- schlecht umgesetzte und sehr schwache Killer (Beispiele: Ein Hillbilly/Kanibale mit einer Kettensäge die nicht tödlich ist ... ein Geist der unsichtbar zu sehen ist und ein sehr lautes geräusch zum unsichtbar und sichtbar werden macht ... Freddy Krüger der auch nur per Harken in seiner Traumwelt töten kann ... das Schwein aus SAW welches einen indikator hat wenn man aus dem schleichen heraus angreift und das zwar umgekehrte Bärenfallen hat, welche aber zu 90% nutzlos und zu einfach zu händeln sind ... Michel Meyers welcher auch nicht ohne Herzschlag auskommt)
- nach 2 Jahren immernoch schwerwiegende Bugs (innerhalb von 30 Minuten 3 Game Crashes)
- nur 2 Objectives, einmal Generatoren reparieren (wo es ein Quicktime Event gibt welches fast ununschaffbar ist (sehr einfach) und das öffnen der Tore im Anschluss)
- sehr große inbalanz zwischen Killer und Überlebende mit großen Vorteilen für die Überlebenden (also Überlebenden sowohl in der Überzahl als auch bevorteilt)
- schlechtes Matchmaking-System (1. trifft man oft auf leute mit 4 seltenen - sehr seltenen Perks wobei man selber erst ma 1 ungewöhnliches Perk hat und 2. werden Game crashes mit Rangverlust bestraft)

und das alles ist nur die Spitze des Eisberges ... schaut einfach ins steam Forum da gibt es eigentlich nur beschwerden und kein Lob an die Entwickler ... das Game ist nur deshalb so gut bewertet, weil hier viele leute nur Überlende spielen und sich auch nicht anstrengen wollen um ein Spiel zu gewinnen und dadurch wird sich das spiel wahrscheinlich nie in ein gutes Spiel verwandeln ...

Leider ...

Начну с того, что игра для остановившихся в развитии nerds, чтобы поджечь пару-тройку продукта.

Среди многочисленных обзоров в Стиме я не видел людей, которые бы сказали правду. Все, словно умалишенные, пишут про интересный геймплей, про страх, и прочее sh*t, в то время, как кроме включения генераторов в игре ничего делать нельзя.
Графика времен архейской эры.
Даже управление отвратительное, просто перемещаться неприятно

Самое обидное, что игра действительно зашла огромному количеству людей. Хотя чего удивляться, ведь это пекари, вы любое sh*t сожрете, которое вышло эксклюзивно на ваш гроб.

Единственное, что понравилось - возможность вернуть свои 300 вечно нулевых.

To anyone who says lobby wait is long. The game mechanic that arrange matchmaking is definitely flawed. But there's a way around it.

The Solution:

Go to your steam setting > Download > Download Region > Change it to UK-London

(Where most players are playing there, I never have an issue finding games. If you ever get stuck looking for a game, ESC and queue again)


The game itself is pretty buggy still and has lag spike given the killer(host)'s ping. But overall it's a great game for it's value. Packed with thrills and fun, I would recommend this game to anyone who loves adrenaline.

lo recomiendo .. tiene algunos bug pero es bueno

自分はある実況者の動画を見て欲しくなりました
実況動画をちょこっと見ただけで『面白そう、欲しい』と思いました
がしかし自分はすぐには買いませんでした
それは、明らかにウブの状態で行ったらすぐやられて萎えると思ったからです
せっかく面白いゲームなのにこのような終わり方では嫌だと思い100時間以上動画を見ました
おかげで出だしは全然苦労せず、その後もずっと楽しく遊んでられます
そこまではいいのですがやっていくうちに『キャンパー』という吊られた生存者を助けないように近くをうろついたりすることです(決して助けられないわけではなく助けようとすると助けようとした人がやられそのループになるからです)
キャンパーがいるとなぜ嫌かというともし自分がやられた時に助けられずランクが下がったりしてしまいます
自分はもうランクを気にしませんけれど、何回もキャンパーと会うとさすがに萎えます
キャンパーになりやすい人たちは大抵初心者です
初心者を嫌がっているのではありません むしろ歓迎してます 
ゲームというものは楽しくするものです みんなが楽しくなければ意味がありません キャンプを絶対にしてはいけないというわけではありませんがほどほどにしてください
またキャンプをされたらこう思ってください そっちの方がモチベーションが上がります
通常キャンプ→『お前はまあまあな腕前であった』
ケバブ→『この野郎、手こずらせやがって』
フェイスキャンプ→『お前を絶対逃さない』
というふうに鬼が思ってると思ってください
とても楽しいゲームをこれからやる人達、またこれからもやる人達、みんなが快くゲームができるように配慮しましょう!
以上長文失礼しました

Great game to play with friends
游戏类型新颖，但有些血腥，建议开发新的游戏模式，而不是只增加游戏角色。

Survivors gate camp at the end of the game no matter what. Its annoying af, I can't even do anything about it. I have to sit there for like 3 minutes while they just t-bag until the time runs out. There's no way the devs don't know about this either, it happens way too often. I would say change it, but clearly they don't see a problem with it. The best thing to do is just spend your money on a better game.
